refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the size of the viewing cube for the MGED display, resulting in a zoom in or zoom out effect.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Changes the size of the viewing cube for the MGED display, resulting in a zoom in or zoom out effect. A scale_factor greater than one reduces the size of the viewing cube (zoom in). A scale_factor of less than one increases the size of the viewing cube (zoom out).

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the zoom command to reduce the size of the viewing cube by half.

example.title: Reduce the size of the viewing cube by half.
example.para: Reduces the size of the current viewing cube by half (effectively doubling the size of objects in the display).
